title: Cardi B, Vin Diesel reveal she's in 'Fast & Furious 9': 'This is gonna be the best one'
text:
CLOSE

Cardi B is reportedly joining the cast of 'Fast 9.' (Photo: SUZANNE CORDEIRO, AFP via Getty Images)

Vin Diesel and Cardi B surprised "Fast and Furious" fans on Monday by sharing that the rapper is set to appear in "Fast & Furious 9."

Diesel took to Instagram to share the news with his followers and give a sneak peek into what he and his new castmate have been up to.

"Day 86 here on the set of 'Fast 9,'” Diesel says in the video alongside Cardi. "I know I’m exhausted. We all gave every single thing we could for this movie, put it all on the table, put it all out there."

And it's understandable that the rapper is beat.

“I’m tired,” Cardi says. “But I can’t wait. I ain’t gonna front, this is gonna be the best one.”

Diesel continues in the video adding that it's their last day of filming in the U.K.

"I need to take a nappy nap," the rapper finishes.

The "regular degular shmegular girl from the Bronx" is set to appear in the 10th installment of the "Fast and Furious" franchise, according to Deadline and Entertainment Weekly. Both outlets reported that the rapper has a small role in the film, set to be released in May.

Cardi B first made her acting debut this year in "Hustlers," starring alongside Lizzo, Jennifer Lopez, Constance Wu and Keke Palmer.

USA TODAY has reached out to Cardi B and Universal for comment.

description: Vin Diesel and Cardi B surprised fans when the duo appeared in a video together from the set of 'Fast & Furious 9.'
